data.name: Branded in Red
data.desc:
Target 1 "Despia" monster or "Fallen of Albaz" in your GY; add it to your hand, then you can apply the following effect.
‚óè Fusion Summon 1 Level 8 or higher Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your hand or field, but it cannot attack directly this turn.
You can only activate 1 "Branded in Red" per turn.
